existing_features.title: Update the Contact section Business Hours UI to display a single status of “Always Open” instead of the current day-by-day schedule.

Make the site logo clearly visible in both the header and footer by adjusting its presentation (e.g., sizing and/or adding a contrasting background, padding, and/or subtle shadow) while keeping the same logo asset path.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Business Hours to display "Always Open" instead of a daily schedule.
Adjust the site logo so it is clearly visible (improve clarity/visibility).

projectName: Show Business Hours as Always Open and Improve Logo Visibility
